verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came unto me, saying<WH559>,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, set<WH7760> thy face<WH6440> against Gog<WH1463>, the land<WH776> of Magog<WH4031>, the chief<WH7218> prince<WH5387> of Meshech<WH4902> and Tubal<WH8422>, and prophesy<WH5012> against him, the chief: or, prince of the chief
And say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog<WH1463>, the chief<WH7218> prince<WH5387> of Meshech<WH4902> and Tubal<WH8422>:

And I will turn thee back<WH7725>, and put<WH5414> hooks<WH2397> into thy jaws<WH3895>, and I will bring thee forth<WH3318>, and all thine army<WH2428>, horses<WH5483> and horsemen<WH6571>, all of them clothed<WH3847> with all sorts<WH4358> of armour, even a great<WH7227> company<WH6951> with bucklers<WH6793> and shields<WH4043>, all of them handling<WH8610> swords<WH2719>:
Persia<WH6539>, Ethiopia<WH3568>, and Libya<WH6316> with them; all of them with shield<WH4043> and helmet<WH3553>: Libya: or, Phut
Gomer<WH1586>, and all his bands<WH102>; the house<WH1004> of Togarmah<WH8425> of the north<WH6828> quarters<WH3411>, and all his bands<WH102>: and many<WH7227> people<WH5971> with thee.
Be thou prepared<WH3559>, and prepare<WH3559> for thyself, thou, and all thy company<WH6951> that are assembled<WH6950> unto thee, and be thou a guard<WH4929> unto them.

After many<WH7227> days<WH3117> thou shalt be visited<WH6485>: in the latter<WH319> years<WH8141> thou shalt come<WH935> into the land<WH776> that is brought back<WH7725> from the sword<WH2719>, and is gathered<WH6908> out of many<WH7227> people<WH5971>, against the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, which have been always<WH8548> waste<WH2723>: but it is brought forth<WH3318> out of the nations<WH5971>, and they shall dwell<WH3427> safely<WH983> all of them.

Thou shalt ascend<WH5927> and come<WH935> like a storm<WH7722>, thou shalt be like a cloud<WH6051> to cover<WH3680> the land<WH776>, thou, and all thy bands<WH102>, and many<WH7227> people<WH5971> with thee.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; It shall also come to pass, that at the same time<WH3117> shall things<WH1697> come<WH5927> into thy mind<WH3824>, and thou shalt think<WH2803> an evil<WH7451> thought<WH4284>: think: or, conceive a mischievous purpose

And thou shalt say<WH559>, I will go up<WH5927> to the land<WH776> of unwalled villages<WH6519>; I will go<WH935> to them that are at rest<WH8252>, that dwell<WH3427> safely<WH983>, all of them dwelling<WH3427> without walls<WH2346>, and having neither bars<WH1280> nor gates<WH1817>, safely: or, confidently

To take<WH7997> a spoil<WH7998>, and to take<WH962> a prey<WH957>; to turn<WH7725> thine hand<WH3027> upon the desolate places<WH2723> that are now inhabited<WH3427>, and upon the people<WH5971> that are gathered<WH622> out of the nations<WH1471>, which have gotten<WH6213> cattle<WH4735> and goods<WH7075>, that dwell<WH3427> in the midst<WH2872> of the land<WH776>. To take: Heb. To spoil the spoil, and to prey the prey midst: Heb. navel

Sheba<WH7614>, and Dedan<WH1719>, and the merchants<WH5503> of Tarshish<WH8659>, with all the young lions<WH3715> thereof, shall say<WH559> unto thee, Art thou come<WH935> to take<WH7997> a spoil<WH7998>? hast thou gathered<WH6950> thy company<WH6951> to take<WH962> a prey<WH957>? to carry away<WH5375> silver<WH3701> and gold<WH2091>, to take away<WH3947> cattle<WH4735> and goods<WH7075>, to take<WH7997> a great<WH1419> spoil<WH7998>?

Therefore, son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, prophesy<WH5012> and say<WH559> unto Gog<WH1463>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; In that day<WH3117> when my people<WH5971> of Israel<WH3478> dwelleth<WH3427> safely<WH983>, shalt thou not know<WH3045> it?

And thou shalt come<WH935> from thy place<WH4725> out of the north<WH6828> parts<WH3411>, thou, and many<WH7227> people<WH5971> with thee, all of them riding<WH7392> upon horses<WH5483>, a great<WH1419> company<WH6951>, and a mighty<WH7227> army<WH2428>:

And thou shalt come up<WH5927> against my people<WH5971> of Israel<WH3478>, as a cloud<WH6051> to cover<WH3680> the land<WH776>; it shall be in the latter<WH319> days<WH3117>, and I will bring<WH935> thee against my land<WH776>, that the heathen<WH1471> may know<WH3045> me, when I shall be sanctified<WH6942> in thee, O Gog<WH1463>, before their eyes<WH5869>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Art thou he of whom I have spoken<WH1696> in old<WH6931> time<WH3117> by<WH3027> my servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030> of Israel<WH3478>, which prophesied<WH5012> in those days<WH3117> many years<WH8141> that I would bring<WH935> thee against them? by: Heb. by the hand of

And it shall come to pass at the same time<WH3117> when<WH3117> Gog<WH1463> shall come<WH935> against the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>, that my fury<WH2534> shall come up<WH5927> in my face<WH639>.

For in my jealousy<WH7068> and in the fire<WH784> of my wrath<WH5678> have I spoken<WH1696>, Surely in that day<WH3117> there shall be a great<WH1419> shaking<WH7494> in the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>;

So that the fishes<WH1709> of the sea<WH3220>, and the fowls<WH5775> of the heaven<WH8064>, and the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704>, and all creeping things<WH7431> that creep<WH7430> upon the earth<WH127>, and all the men<WH120> that are upon the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>, shall shake<WH7493> at my presence<WH6440>, and the mountains<WH2022> shall be thrown down<WH2040>, and the steep places<WH4095> shall fall<WH5307>, and every wall<WH2346> shall fall<WH5307> to the ground<WH776>. steep: or, towers, or, stairs

And I will call<WH7121> for a sword<WH2719> against him throughout all my mountains<WH2022>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>: every man's<WH376> sword<WH2719> shall be against his brother<WH251>.

And I will plead<WH8199> against him with pestilence<WH1698> and with blood<WH1818>; and I will rain<WH4305> upon him, and upon his bands<WH102>, and upon the many<WH7227> people<WH5971> that are with him, an overflowing<WH7857> rain<WH1653>, and great hailstones<WH417> <WH68>, fire<WH784>, and brimstone<WH1614>.

Thus will I magnify<WH1431> myself, and sanctify<WH6942> myself; and I will be known<WH3045> in the eyes<WH5869> of many<WH7227> nations<WH1471>, and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.
